abstract: William M. Daley, the White House chief of staff, comes from a big business and Main Street Democratic background, but he has having trouble satisfying either group.
snippet: William M. Daley, the White House chief of staff, comes from a big business and Main Street Democratic background, but he has having trouble satisfying either group.
lead_paragraph: William M. Daley might have picked a harder time than autumn 2011 to explain Democrats and Wall Street to each other.

headline.main: Daley Struggles to Please Both Wall Street and Left
